Module.name: Quiller
Module.Setting: type : RETURN_ITEM ; quest_incomplete_dialog : Come back with 5000 gold! ; quest_complete_dialog : Thank you for finding me 5000 gold. ; name : I need some money! ; desc : Greetings traveler! I have a quest for you should you choose to accept it. Go and find me 5000 gold pieces!

type : RETURN_ITEM ; quest_incomplete_dialog : Bah! Come back with 5000 gold! ; quest_complete_dialog : Thank you for finding me ANOTHER 5000 gold. ; name : More money! ; desc : Welcome back! I have a quest for you should you choose to accept it. Go and find me another 5000 gold pieces! I bet you will find the gold in that temple over there.
